_header: That of wise man maketh him mad
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, love toward
_description: Acts that please Christ, in a Latin sermon — two couplets

CULKk424.Transcription:
þat of wisman makyt hym maddeþat wynneth hym wo &
                    myȝth be gladeþat sylleþ for nouȝth þat ys
                    worþ mestþat queymyth hym most þat loueþ hym
                    lest
